scripts.create-tables: cat src/sql/create-tables.sql src/sql/populate-tables.sql src/sql/samplebulletin.sql | mysql -u root
scripts.setup: npm run create-user && npm run create-tables && npm install && npm run pages create && npm test
scripts.remove: test -d node_modules && npm run pages remove && npm run remove-user && npm run clean || echo Nothing to do.
